00016 #include "stdio.h"
00017 #include "stdlib.h"
00018 #include "utility.h"
00019 #include "string.h"

00021 
00022 /*!*****************************************************************************
00023  *******************************************************************************
00024 \note  main
00025 \date  02/25/92 
00026    
00027 \remarks 
00028            
00029  *******************************************************************************
00030  Function Parameters: [in]=input,[out]=output
00031 
00032  \param[in]     argc : standard arguments to give some initial input to the program
00033  \param[in]     arv  : s.o.
00034 
00035  ******************************************************************************/
00036 int
00037 main(int argc, char **argv)
00038 {
00039   int    i,j,k;
00040   int    rc;
00041   char   fname[200];
00042   char   fname_out[200];
00043   FILE  *fp;
00044   int    count;
00045   char  *string;
00046   double aux;
00047   int    n_cols;
00048   int    n_rows;
00049   Matrix D;
00050   char   **vnames;
00051   char   **units;
00052   char   special[5];
00053   char  *strptr;
00054   
00055   
00056 
00057   for (i=1; i<argc; ++i) {
00058 
00059     strcpy(fname,argv[i]);
00060     printf("Processing >%s< ... ",fname);
00061     
00062     // open the file
00063     fp = fopen(fname,"r");
00064     if (fp == NULL) {
00065       printf("Cannot open file >%s< -- file skipped!\n",fname);
00066       continue;
00067     }
00068 
00069     // find out how many columns by searching for the \n charcter
00070     count = 0;
00071     rc=fgetc(fp);
00072     while (rc != '\n' && rc != EOF) {
00073       ++count;
00074       rc=fgetc(fp);
00075     }
00076 
00077     string = my_calloc(count+1,sizeof(char),MY_STOP);
00078 
00079     rewind(fp);
00080 
00081     for (j=1; j<=count; ++j)
00082       string[j-1] = fgetc(fp);
00083     string[j] = '\0';
00084 
00085 
00086     count = 0;
00087     special[0] = ' ';
00088     special[1] = '\t';
00089     special[2] = ';';
00090     special[3] = ',';
00091     special[4] = '\0';
00092     strptr = string;
00093     while (strtok(strptr,special) != NULL) {
00094       ++count;
00095       strptr = NULL;
00096     }
00097 
00098     n_cols = count;
00099 
00100     rewind(fp);
00101     count = 0;
00102     while ((rc=fscanf(fp,"%lf",&aux)) == 1) {
00103       ++count;
00104     }
00105 
00106     n_rows = count/n_cols;
00107     printf("found %d columns and %d rows ... ",n_cols,n_rows);
00108 
00109     // allocate memory
00110     D = my_matrix(1,n_rows,1,n_cols);
00111     vnames = (char **) my_calloc(n_cols+1,sizeof(char *),MY_STOP);
00112     units  = (char **) my_calloc(n_cols+1,sizeof(char *),MY_STOP);
00113     for (j=1; j<=n_cols; ++j) {
00114       vnames[j] = (char *) my_calloc(20,sizeof(char),MY_STOP);
00115       units[j]  = (char *) my_calloc(20,sizeof(char),MY_STOP);
00116       sprintf(vnames[j],"%d",j);
00117       sprintf(units[j],"-");
00118     }
00119 
00120     rewind(fp);
00121     for (j=1; j<=n_rows; ++j)
00122       for (k=1; k<=n_cols; ++k)
00123         rc=fscanf(fp,"%lf",&(D[j][k]));
00124 
00125     fclose(fp);
00126 
00127     sprintf(fname_out,"d%s",fname);
00128 
00129     mrdplot_gen(fname_out,D,vnames,units,1.0,n_cols,n_rows);
00130 
00131     for (j=1; j<=n_cols; ++j) {
00132       free(vnames[j]);
00133       free(units[j]);
00134     }
00135     free(vnames);
00136     free(units);
00137     my_free_matrix(D,1,n_cols,1,n_rows);
00138 
00139     printf("output in >%s< ... done.\n",fname);
00140     
00141   }
00142         
00143   return TRUE;
00144 
00145 }
